Overview

The application is built using vue js, vuex and vue-router. The application allow users to add new post and edit existing posts. While editing a Post, the user is also able to update the category using a multi-select (because a post can have multiple categories). The first item of that dropdown is a “Create New Category” which lets the user create a category on the fly.

View Project »
View Code »

Technologies Used

  • Vue js
  • Vuex
  • Vue-router
  • Semantic-ui
  • The app was built to showcase my skills in using vue js alongside vuex and vue-router.
